original_title: Violent Sorrow Makes a Modern Ecstasy No. 2
overview: Violent Sorrow Seems a Modern Ecstasy no. 2 is a video art trilogy that consists of staged and aestheticised scenes of violence without dialogue. The action takes place in three decadent environments during different decades of the 20th century.
title: Violent Sorrow Makes a Modern Ecstasy No. 2
